00059     UIManager::UIManager()
00060         : HoveredButton(NULL),
00061           HoveredWidget(NULL),
00062           WidgetFocus(NULL)
00063     {
00064         Silver = new Gorilla::Silverback();
00065         InputQueryer = new InputQueryTool();
00066         Priority = -35;
00067     }
00068 
00069     UIManager::~UIManager()
00070     {
00071         DestroyAllScreens();
00072         delete Silver;
00073     }
00074 
00075     void UIManager::HoverChecks()
00076     {
00077         if(HoveredButton)
00078         {
00079             if(HoveredButton->CheckMouseHover())
00080             {
00081                 return;
00082             }
00083         }
00084         if(HoveredWidget)
00085         {
00086             if(HoveredWidget->CheckMouseHover())
00087             {
00088                 HoveredWidget->Update();
00089                 return;
00090             }
00091         }
00092         HoveredButton = CheckButtonMouseIsOver();
00093         if(!HoveredButton)
00094         {
00095             HoveredWidget = CheckWidgetMouseIsOver();
00096             if(HoveredWidget)
00097             {
00098                 //HoveredButton = HoveredWidget->GetHoveredButton();
00099                 HoveredWidget->Update();
00100             }
00101         }
00102     }
00103 
00104     void UIManager::WidgetFocusUpdate()
00105     {
00106         if(HoveredWidget || WidgetFocus)
00107         {
00108             MetaCode::ButtonState State = InputQueryer->GetMouseButtonState(1);
00109             if(MetaCode::BUTTON_PRESSING == State)
00110             {
00111                 WidgetFocus = HoveredWidget;
00112             }
00113             else if(MetaCode::BUTTON_DOWN == State)
00114             {
00115                 if(HoveredWidget != WidgetFocus && WidgetFocus)
00116                     WidgetFocus->Update(true);
00117             }
00118             else if(MetaCode::BUTTON_LIFTING == State)
00119             {
00120                 if(HoveredWidget != WidgetFocus)
00121                     WidgetFocus->Update(true);
00122                 WidgetFocus = NULL;
00123             }
00124         }
00125     }
00126 
00127     void UIManager::Initialize()
00128     {
00129     }
00130 
00131     void UIManager::DoMainLoopItems()
00132     {
00133         InputQueryer->GatherEvents();
00134         HoverChecks();
00135         WidgetFocusUpdate();
00136     }
00137 
00138     void UIManager::LoadGorilla(const String& Name)
00139     {
00140         Silver->loadAtlas(Name);
00141     }
00142 
00143     void UIManager::RedrawAll(bool Force)
00144     {
00145         for( std::vector<UIScreen*>::iterator it = Screens.begin() ; it != Screens.end() ; it++ )
00146         {
00147             (*it)->GetGorillaScreen()->_redrawAllIndexes(Force);
00148         }
00149     }

00157     {
00158         return HoveredWidget;

00161     UI::Widget* UIManager::GetWidgetFocus()
00162     {
00163         return WidgetFocus;

00166     UIScreen* UIManager::CreateScreen(const String& ScreenName, const String& Atlas, Viewport* WindowViewport)
00167     {
00168         Ogre::Viewport* OgrePort = WindowViewport->GetOgreViewport();
00169         Gorilla::Screen* guiscreen = Silver->createScreen(OgrePort, Atlas);
00170         UIScreen* physscreen = new UIScreen(ScreenName, guiscreen, WindowViewport);
00171         Screens.push_back(physscreen);
00172         return physscreen;
00173     }
00174 
00175     UIScreen* UIManager::GetScreen(const String& Name)
00176     {
00177         std::vector<UIScreen*>::iterator it = Screens.begin();
00178         for ( std::vector<UIScreen*>::iterator it = Screens.begin() ; it != Screens.end() ; it++ )
00179         {
00180             if ( Name == (*it)->GetName() )
00181             {
00182                 UIScreen* Screen = (*it);
00183                 return Screen;
00184             }
00185         }
00186         return 0;
00187     }
00188 
00189     UIScreen* UIManager::GetScreen(Whole Index)
00190     {
00191         return Screens[Index];
00192     }
00193 
00194     Whole UIManager::GetNumScreens()
00195     {
00196         return Screens.size();
00197     }
00198 
00199     void UIManager::DestroyScreen(UIScreen* Screen)
00200     {
00201         if(Screens.empty())
00202             return;
00203         for( std::vector<UIScreen*>::iterator it = Screens.begin() ; it != Screens.end() ; it++ )
00204         {
00205             if( Screen == (*it) )
00206             {
00207                 delete (*it);
00208                 Screens.erase(it);
00209                 return;
00210             }
00211         }
00212     }
00213 
00214     void UIManager::DestroyAllScreens()
00215     {
00216         if(Screens.empty())
00217             return;
00218         for( std::vector<UIScreen*>::iterator it = Screens.begin() ; it != Screens.end() ; it++ )
00219         {
00220             delete (*it);
00221         }
00222         Screens.clear();
00223         return;
00224     }
00225 
00226     UILayer* UIManager::GetLayer(String& Name)
00227     {
00228         for( Whole x=0 ; x < Screens.size() ; x++ )
00229         {
00230             UILayer* Layer = Screens[x]->GetLayer(Name);
00231             if(NULL!=Layer)
00232                 return Layer;
00233         }
00234         return 0;
00235     }
00236 
00237     UI::Button* UIManager::CheckButtonMouseIsOver()
00238     {
00239         for( Whole x=0 ; x < Screens.size() ; x++ )
00240         {
00241             if( Screens[x]->IsVisible() )
00242             {
00243                 UI::Button* button = Screens[x]->CheckButtonMouseIsOver();
00244                 if(button)
00245                 {
00246                     return button;
00247                 }
00248             }
00249         }
00250         return 0;
00251     }
00252 
00253     UI::Widget* UIManager::CheckWidgetMouseIsOver()
00254     {
00255         for( Whole x=0 ; x < Screens.size() ; x++ )
00256         {
00257             if( Screens[x]->IsVisible() )
00258             {
00259                 UI::Widget* widget = Screens[x]->CheckWidgetMouseIsOver();
00260                 if(widget)
00261                 {
00262                     return widget;
00263                 }
00264             }
00265         }
00266         return 0;
00267     }
00268 
00269     bool UIManager::MouseIsInUISystem()
00270     {
00271         if(HoveredButton || HoveredWidget || WidgetFocus)
00272         {
00273             return true;
00274         }else{
00275             return false;
00276         }
00277     }

00279     InputQueryTool* UIManager::GetInputQueryer()
00280     {
00281         return InputQueryer;
00282     }

00285         { return ManagerBase::UIManager; }
